text: Ang Kamay ng Diyos () is a 1947 Philippine drama film directed by Eddie Romero. It was the first film ever directed by him. ==Cast== *Gerry De Leon *Kaycee Romano *Leopoldo Salcedo ==External links== * Category:1947 films Category:Philippine films Category:Tagalog-language films Category:Filipino- language films Category:Films directed by Eddie Romero Category:1947 drama films Category:Philippine black-and-white films
title: Ang Kamay ng Diyos
